elements.characterName: My chest is being squeezed hard.

dialogs.1b116870-e1bd-4ce5-8974-8b5278f162e5: Someone's embracing me from the back and holding me tight.
dialogs.9f71307c-7099-42f0-8491-e3f19ffaf0c1: Going by these slender arms, it has to be a girl. Not to mention, I can feel something soft pressing up against my back.

dialogs.80409b23-0816-4a78-ba5b-57c1dbfae683: Cut it out, Chinatsu. I can't breathe.
dialogs.5d019ce8-4600-44c1-a4c5-6d8581a0ca98: Why is this girl so hug-happy?
dialogs.35d58071-8b45-4da5-a6a8-cff416ccc1d9: I don't particularly mind, but it is embarrassing. And I don't know about being so clingy with a guy who's not your boyfriend.

dialogs.19bf0be8-24d5-4ade-a2f5-ec50c74373dc: The girl's hands suddenly put a lot more pressure on my chest, making me cough out the air in my lungs.

dialogs.89cc1316-debd-4703-963f-a29fcfdcea1f: The air around here smells stale.
dialogs.7cc9bbc3-dffc-4a2c-aa9a-715406eada3b: I see dimly lit concrete walls when I open my eyes.

dialogs.56b3b98a-54df-4537-bb33-0210cceabab7: A woman's face peers into mine.
dialogs.8466724c-730f-450b-8f86-ee8a639d85b4: She has her arms wrapped around me and is dragging me along as she walks.

dialogs.1bfcca9c-b3f6-401a-9419-68839a74be53: I get dragged another two meters as I try to figure out how to respond.
dialogs.1a88a2dc-af4f-4c44-b80d-cc32e8e8864c: Right. I was fighting in a virtual battlefield a minute ago.

dialogs.b186a645-72a2-4a4f-ba82-f828443b681b: Uh, Lieutenant? If you are awake, do you mind getting on your feet?

dialogs.08c29fca-aba2-4f77-ba1f-38bf8300f860: I try to stand in a hurry.

dialogs.a31469f5-f5a8-472a-87eb-b89c603e48d5: But I slip, and the back of my head hits the floor hard.

dialogs.ffedd178-0282-4e72-b484-401c45c428c4: Are you all right? That sounded bad.

dialogs.edec50bf-48da-4eec-b091-c9458290e677: While rubbing my head, I stand up and face Rain.

dialogs.bf64557a-04be-4e5c-a2d9-ba0b381c2ed9: I knew how she looked thanks to the face window, but this is something else entirely.
dialogs.72b4d769-8fdf-413b-b764-d05a27eb3074: Shiny blonde locks and eyes as blue as the sea.
dialogs.77be4c48-5b2b-4ba7-883d-c3a67b1841f7: She's incredibly pretty. Once again, I find it hard to believe that she's a soldier.

dialogs.d863d4f2-1a20-4552-90e0-3572f987ba99: And she has a huge rack. But that doesn't detract from her hourglass figure, and she has a very refined air about her.

dialogs.8e0c15bf-e139-4af1-88fd-c92732769e4a: I quit gawking at Rain and shake my head.

dialogs.f14f7291-0451-4e3c-a010-70d1ff19bae1: A makeshift dive point. We'd logged into the internet from here.
dialogs.2e3a6eac-1527-4f02-9087-332a111b38db: As soldiers, we lie in consoles equipped with life-support systems and dive into the battlefield... I think.

dialogs.761bb376-f22c-436c-a999-4e4ca892fc66: I don't see any consoles. Why weren't we in an operations room?

dialogs.9e5ab899-c21f-4820-baa3-809f2cbde42d: Unlike normal missions, we cannot use actual operations rooms or consoles.

dialogs.f7385a0c-9b06-4357-a032-eb8b461f7ae7: That doesn't sound very good. Please don't tell me we were involved in guerrilla warfare.

dialogs.cfb0dd6d-238a-434b-88bf-9ccaa2fb1b2c: Rain shoots a glance behind her. Now that my eyes have adapted to the dark, I see a few silhouettes.

dialogs.04d730e6-16e8-4e83-818e-a7b17af248d6: Over there, a few people are sitting on the floor with their backs to the wall, and there's a bunch of portable equipment lying about.

dialogs.74114277-0e1e-41df-84b3-9ed5000fbe32: They're all mercenaries you hired for this mission through an agency.

dialogs.9c8a3478-c8a5-435d-b7bd-893b0eb63690: They were all KIA when the structure self-destructed. I checked, and I'm sorry to report that they've all flatlined.
dialogs.0be81a04-f31c-4596-bbfa-0a59034e1fe0: A shiver runs through my spine. I finally realize that people have died here.
dialogs.297c5e2f-4a23-46d5-9267-e7571b48faaf: How am I supposed to look at times like these?
dialogs.8b1da833-ba0a-474d-9e33-1156aac16630: I stay rooted to my spot and stare at the corpses of my fellow soldiers.

dialogs.b448fb09-3eb4-4c2a-80c0-4c31699ab3e7: These people were my teammates, weren't they?

dialogs.26193c42-abcd-4d71-9b2f-b8ab07bccfd7: Fortunately,@t0123@hRAIN_0302KN as inappropriate as that may sound,@t0398@hRAIN_0301SK they weren't exactly your friends.
dialogs.d9549bd7-053d-402f-a4ca-ae4b807bd245: Even as she spouts those heartless words, Rain gives me a worried look.
dialogs.f09540dd-be92-4e10-9d09-391e6a3d9482: She's probably looking out for me. Meanwhile, I start walking toward the corpses.
dialogs.73b1d76e-f60e-4f85-b543-3064646b2b18: Rain immediately stops me by grabbing my arm.

dialogs.64a418a5-18c0-400c-b60a-ec953fd9e811: While it would be nice to give them a proper sendoff, we must get going at once.

dialogs.0f73e875-577a-4d8e-b058-c52b46668b8a: Sadly, that's the kind of business we're in.  They wouldn't hold it against us.

dialogs.d4c878c2-9aff-4c7a-b12b-a4f8cb63047d: My mind can't keep up with all of this crap.
dialogs.cf75eaf6-4ad4-4d24-a2e7-e8070afbe8ac: I wake up on a battlefield, I'm forced to fight immediately...
dialogs.76de6dac-34ea-49f4-9209-38098f46a7e2: And when I finally get back to the real world, I'm faced with a pile of corpses.

dialogs.10e21e7d-7750-481e-ad60-63de07131523: A sliver of doubt creeps into my mind. Should I really trust Rain?
dialogs.0416b2b7-459f-40a9-acb6-46b04444411c: Right now, I remember nothing about her. What if she's trying to use that to her benefit?

dialogs.369f68e9-fa12-4c2e-88c8-9d82fa8320f7: Please trust me.  Though I realize it might be a lot to ask right now.

dialogs.a11e960a-b7f2-4ac4-bc03-b075ee2a5477: Nah. Rain saved my life back there.
dialogs.22e227ed-6279-4517-8242-b533731c87d2: Why would she do that if she wanted to take me down?
dialogs.8f7dfe99-b1f8-4913-a06e-ec49cac7d604: I'm not sure why, but something deep inside of me tells me that I can trust her.

dialogs.45034b24-3285-42da-8ca0-49bb010a4f30: All right. I mean, you are my comrade.

dialogs.ecec2eed-8a48-44ba-baa1-b6e605976245: Rain takes my hand and breaks out into a run.

dialogs.bbc400ac-0c86-40c3-acb7-8f60f9d3f7c2: Cold air rushes in the moment the hatch opens up, carrying with it an awful stench and the hustle and bustle of the outside.

dialogs.7d6fdd4f-3d8f-4ebb-99c5-1629bf238f1e: Since my eyes had gotten used to the dark, they're blinded for a moment by all the bright lights.
dialogs.b4ae7c73-699c-4b37-9473-8e7e5b9b1703: As my vision gradually returns, I see a lit-up skyscraper in front of me, neon signs of all colors at its bottom.

dialogs.629868ae-fdb3-488d-bb45-42381ca1dd9c: Rain drags me into the crowd.
dialogs.f89ba607-ad9f-49d2-8b4b-ec43207fd2a6: When my eyes adapt to the city lights, everything they'd been hiding comes into view.

dialogs.9f3d285b-1c1a-4406-bc98-52f459c1373b: Old, dilapidated high-rises with their walls littered in graffiti...
dialogs.225e29af-5546-4e43-8e2d-daeb7e6dd3b2: Trash strewn about all over the place, and a crowd of dead men walking.
dialogs.ab69d123-03ee-4f06-84b7-4a382cf2b8d6: It's a sight that embodies the concept of decay.
dialogs.3ef5c67c-6719-4a85-ae75-4a57b22cdbdc: Looking at it reminds me of something.

dialogs.43202d93-c96f-4ef5-9e83-ccfb3cd22b81: Yes, this is Suzushiro City, a standalone city-state under the direct control of the GU.
dialogs.66574f7f-8ed4-486d-a110-9eb8265352f1: Two or three generations ago, the world was consolidated under the banner of the Global Union.
dialogs.f3d33383-88af-45c2-abbe-b80b638132d1: The nations of the past became provinces, and national militaries became provincial ones.
dialogs.5f1de551-0d9a-40e9-8c64-1c7bf9d7b191: That was supposed to have put an end to our long history of warfare, but it turned out to be wishful thinking even with the world unified.
dialogs.1d16b642-4aeb-4a4a-bd32-16e01867f4b5: Civil wars and rebellions were rife, and armed conflicts among various regional blocs became commonplace.
dialogs.44807c19-29b4-43b4-9410-c6dd6aa9d460: Even right before we were born, this province had been involved in a massive war.
dialogs.ebdb631c-4239-43d0-bdb1-3bfa716f7b83: To us, it came to be known as simply "the War."

dialogs.c4f6239b-2311-4a65-9779-1bd210150c95: My dad fought in the War too.  Actually, I think he stayed on as a soldier even after it ended, only this time as a mercenary.

dialogs.7ce02782-c44e-462b-95fd-cd27a005e44e: That is correct. Do you remember his name?

dialogs.87bd1674-96da-4027-b9d6-d429aa566628: Uh...  Eiji. His name's Eiji Kadokura.
dialogs.c2e2fd76-c218-4f44-993c-796b9d18e80e: An image of him, clad in uniform, comes to mind.
dialogs.c7cf46f4-1a2c-4c33-a5c9-dcc954ae85d2: For some reason, it doesn't elicit very pleasant feelings.
dialogs.011f4237-398d-489f-887d-4ad5116e550d: After the War, heavy restrictions were placed on provincial armies everywhere, and they were downsized and merged into police organizations like the City Defense Force here in Suzushiro.
dialogs.1b16ae20-23dd-4156-a48b-c18e19da5586: But the demand for troops never really went away.
dialogs.8ed01b59-4da4-4006-b1a3-ea30b392ae35: Private military companies rapidly rose to prominence and plugged the gap the armies had left behind.
dialogs.e670daf6-7f63-4db0-a0b9-de532e86e827: It was almost like our society had regressed to the 18th century.
dialogs.ac625279-0169-4dd0-9e66-2421643a0c43: And, at this point, PMCs and their contractors make up the majority of the world's military operations.

dialogs.b86c886d-3554-41f2-924b-02d2a9280774: Do you know what my dad's up to?

dialogs.40144314-bc8e-4005-b277-09e396014289: I do. He's still a mercenary, and...

dialogs.e2409e33-66a1-48b7-8646-b7a860175bee: Rain begins to speak, but her words are wiped out by the roar of a VTOL flying past.

dialogs.3e240f85-0941-494a-a8e6-0d46007cabd8: I think I recognize that thing. Isn't it a military aircraft?

dialogs.a08689d5-cc97-4fab-8e50-19bbb77a1f32: Yes, but don't worry. It's not looking for us. Here in Suzushiro, a VTOL roaming the sky is an everyday occurrence.

dialogs.10eeeaa3-e80f-4119-be39-3b26c15262fe: Oh, I bet. I mean, even I was fighting online not too long ago.

dialogs.7e966241-4bc2-4214-9024-bc2edc3a536a: My dad still hasn't quit the mercenary business, huh?

dialogs.37badb9b-ec99-4d18-b3d9-dbb47884738e: No. I'm sure you'll remember more about him as you regain your memories.
dialogs.9c2e29d1-763f-4939-ac1a-79ae4b51bbdd: Rain doesn't seem very comfortable with the topic. But I can kinda see why.
dialogs.a8274267-443e-4fac-8c7e-34e06477b071: Even now, with my memories all jumbled, just thinking about him gets me irritated. I seriously doubt we're on the best of terms.

dialogs.b2133977-c9f6-4774-96ac-287c98c5d358: Let's keep going. I've booked us a place to stay.

dialogs.a2cc9d52-8df2-425a-b7c4-60f676dfad51: Oh, okay...  Wait, when did you do that?

dialogs.1b1e532c-6818-4051-8c8c-59934972a44f: Well, we are connected to the internet 24/7.

dialogs.b335aef2-2595-4241-b7af-638f954ea24d: With that curt answer, Rain starts walking away.

dialogs.65326509-d808-4dc9-85d0-0a1e4d3951f2: Something about Rain's words bothers me. I think I've heard them before.
dialogs.d30dde86-6a15-40dd-9491-22588543000f: Who said that? Saying it out loud sends a small pang through my chest.

dialogs.e19ee289-c3e0-4826-8f14-0c33b9374dfc: What's the matter, Lieutenant? Keep up.

dialogs.83384623-8ab4-48e8-9a17-064506348c2c: I follow Rain and walk into the nightlife.
dialogs.7ae954e4-7ad9-48d5-8ae7-9f5ac7e73aae: After roaming the filthy streets for a while, we walk into a cheap corner hotel.

dialogs.ee14e021-4462-41f8-be68-e5f88a796f6d: In the middle of our trashy room sits a double bed with slightly dirty sheets.
dialogs.b0754149-effc-47cf-bf62-e6383d11063d: Only a glass door stands between the room and the bath, and the closet's filled with toys that are the furthest thing from wholesome.
dialogs.202d3a35-4b98-4803-9aa2-0cea8a8b70f0: To top it all off, there's a set of contraceptives and drugs by the pillows.

dialogs.07d37998-51d5-4308-b318-ee217a538edd: Are we really gonna stay here?

dialogs.31a20c2a-e80c-4785-a5d8-a5870a959391: You'll have to forgive me. I could only find hotels like this in the neighborhood.

dialogs.243ec590-89a4-4793-acd7-5d185f0a2ba1: Besides, this kind of room actually tends to offer the best privacy in the city.

dialogs.294410fb-870d-4423-b974-cd25fede8675: As she speaks, she sticks her hand between a piece of furniture and the wall.

dialogs.14848f6f-a877-46c1-8fea-b8352c5d1154: When she takes it back out, I see it holding a tiny apparatus a self-propelled spy robot.

dialogs.b9272b4f-de98-4705-bcd7-882d2636dda4: So we'll be fine if we destroy the spying equipment.

dialogs.c1ed08b5-4d6f-4b3f-9d74-c9246f85cefe: Watch out for hidden cameras, huh? Because of the room? Or could it be...

dialogs.533e09f6-aa23-4c1f-a884-2077d0fdc7d7: It's unlikely that we've been exposed. We must still stay on our toes, though, of course.

dialogs.b3a333b8-be8d-45e2-be78-50e1b4aa00c3: I guess we won't exactly get away scot-free if it comes out that we were involved in that battle earlier.

dialogs.5e1990dc-b934-4ed0-88df-812e7ce0983b: All of this makes me sigh, and I sink into a couch placed in the room.

dialogs.acb9ca03-9eec-42a2-933e-810e001834a9: Rain takes off her coat and heads to the kitchen.

dialogs.5bc435a2-f100-4e29-b6a0-5b805c0a5ea6: Even the slightest of movements makes her beautiful hair sway from side to side.
dialogs.a7c1b697-65e6-4351-a343-af5afd3e2eb3: As it does, I catch a glimpse of her shapely behind. She's surprisingly thick for someone with such a slender build.

dialogs.00c6711e-40ca-4891-b26b-e57f844cbc26: I wonder if I'm being influenced by where we are. I'm becoming all-too-painfully aware that I'm alone in a room with a woman.

dialogs.7c695c57-401a-454f-b630-6455e15128c7: I have some nerve to be thinking about butts in this situation, even if I do say so myself.

dialogs.60b2f05a-31ef-4484-835e-4cb1d1caf92e: Calm down, sir. We should be fine for a while here.

dialogs.dcdffba3-b4e2-4e03-91b8-7ca9d89d954e: Blissfully unaware of the thoughts running through my head, Rain offers me a cup of tea.

dialogs.a49757a9-0766-45d0-bca8-f156462d2601: I receive the cup and take a sip. The hot tea calms my nerves a little.

dialogs.a4e611c8-2cc8-426e-ba1c-2f840423544d: Uh, I know this is kinda late, but thanks for earlier.

dialogs.5e6e7112-68d5-419c-bfa0-7d944b026922: I didn't know what to do because it was all so sudden. Who knows what might've happened if you weren't there with me.

dialogs.c37196e1-f5af-49ef-90bd-1c1811dc2d7d: I only did my job as your support, sir.

dialogs.e3989db4-9653-4633-bd3b-a5ef01ee1954: Also, you needn't be so formal. Regardless of the state your memories are in, you are still my superior officer.

dialogs.d7c98ea4-f4fa-4e91-b881-05da31a65cde: But I have to. I mean, you're an older woman and all.

dialogs.39f01ff5-17da-4ff7-acf8-815dd825fb62: Wait, do I seem older to you?

dialogs.00f52b12-d53b-4e20-83cc-5eed9f046d4a: "Do I seem older"?  Hang on, am I the older one here?!
dialogs.fee3c004-e40e-4c8c-8a3b-c6b64eb9d2f2: I rush to look at myself in the mirror.

dialogs.de95dfb8-91c7-4ad4-ac5e-3ae82e13dcb0: I breathe a sigh of relief when I see the familiar face of a youngster in the reflection.

dialogs.2dc87984-63df-41f8-81aa-893862918c17: Phew. I don't know what I would've done if I were middle-aged.

dialogs.2688fec8-45b8-49f1-a711-8135c965a612: Your looks have never really changed. Though they did gain a hint of toughness as you accumulated more combat experience.

dialogs.3228015c-780a-4f96-8860-e1ec94fecb0d: I see. Am I baby-faced or something?
dialogs.b3b619bd-5d56-48fb-a025-e5e3ed0d2cd6: I may be relieved, but I'm not convinced. I look at my reflection once again, this time in one of the windows.

dialogs.52c2f494-7573-4e91-99f2-52482ecf6c2e: Apparently, it's hard to tell the difference between teens and adults in their twenties these days.

dialogs.460126f3-d457-4094-b013-6f3263edd35f: Our instructor was always complaining about how no amount of training would ever make us look like soldiers.

dialogs.079e4e4a-3c63-4579-8e2a-e9ba7958d5e8: Have we known each other that long?

dialogs.c744fbe7-763c-4a1c-92b5-2d91968895eb: Yes. We enlisted at the same time and have stayed together for several years now.

dialogs.7693130b-82a0-4242-9c34-324a100d841c: That so? Why did I become a soldier, anyway?

dialogs.ba2920b5-c6f5-4b95-9ab2-3e202c644cb7: You're a lieutenant. Not an everyday soldier.

dialogs.d5b6a7c7-70bc-436f-b265-540da4d753c9: It's military tradition to make pilots commissioned officers.

dialogs.302e27bc-1792-4650-b91f-6318e0bac88d: I'm already an officer at this age?

dialogs.2528795c-3c29-4e59-8331-15eff17f30b6: Second-gens like you and me get preferential treatment in the military.
dialogs.241ec64e-40a9-4909-95f6-51e2d24015e5: Saying that, Rain traces the nape of her neck with her fingertip. Her neurojack port opens up in response.

dialogs.06d4852d-007e-45f2-90c9-44af20de8ed2: We're second-generation brain chip holders. Have you forgotten, Lieutenant?
dialogs.fd8a003d-af41-408a-a71b-4b0447fa6fd5: Second-generation... That term seems familiar, but I don't recall what exactly it means.

dialogs.74d505c0-2060-46f6-ae85-552b20535c56: Looks like there're a bunch of things I still need to remember.

dialogs.ee437fba-8879-4744-b6af-76f758e30f0f: I don't even know what I was doing before I lost my memories.

dialogs.ed4bbd86-047a-4e3c-b168-0a926d968716: And what kind of facility was that, anyway?

dialogs.6f7c412b-2931-4dab-82f3-3f3a2aa21712: A sudden, head-splitting pain derails my train of thought.

dialogs.66a067d5-424d-4322-836e-23e1da4dfef2: I'm fine. I just got a little headache.
dialogs.d59b2026-adc4-40cd-8ecd-22ec81f4a4c1: As I reassure her, I press my hurting temples with my fingers.
dialogs.8fcd5fc7-b24d-4a11-ae97-214f13ed65b0: I can feel my body juices rise up to my throat.

dialogs.f4fca7c3-af53-46f4-a1ba-e250f77fd02c: You must be tired. Get some rest tonight.

dialogs.feb06790-ece6-45a5-b2c9-71a28fb26128: Rain puts her hand on my shoulder.

dialogs.d4559afa-2198-42ed-be7e-8cea246e7345: Tomorrow, I'll take you to a clinic that might be able to help.

dialogs.9ab88c0e-1aea-4773-bde4-e31ab138bd95: The answers you seek lie in your memories.

dialogs.23369bc0-966e-4881-ae15-2886844dc8ac: But could you at least tell me part of what you know? Quit beating around the bush, please.

dialogs.f99d7d69-c606-4408-a637-ea444599c944: Is there a reason you're keeping it from me?

dialogs.582970db-6b36-4400-9e16-ec3090f2b360: Telling you everything at once would only throw your mind into chaos.

dialogs.6e12b410-dc55-401c-99cd-d66a7b523f78: Please trust me. I'm doing this for your own good.
dialogs.c17deb7f-1ed5-4666-ac9b-f265f912cc05: Rain refuses to answer my questions, and we somehow end up glaring at each other.

elements.characterName: Refuse to back down and press further

dialogs.c98016bb-94e8-4fba-adbb-86ee9c557b23: I'd love to trust you, believe me.

dialogs.c853d678-565e-4eb2-85fd-5ec73622f672: Then trust my decision for now, even if you can't accept it.

dialogs.74d12dac-ca63-4978-8383-1521a1c0efe4: She's giving me such an earnest look. Come to think of it, she looked at me the same way back on the battlefield.
dialogs.3688e6b9-7742-4dc8-b242-b10c5a8bf7ca: You couldn't look like this if you were acting. Whatever other reasons she may have, there's no doubt she's doing this out of concern for me.

dialogs.f0d96c4b-225b-4d98-b376-9bfa9709365a: Can you do me just one favor, then?

dialogs.ef144676-c19d-46a7-b0fc-06c8a0b8f7be: Could you stop calling me that? It just doesn't feel right to me, like you're talking to someone else.

dialogs.9ee15a57-b0f8-40f6-909f-4f48cb4d7b70: Sadly, I have neither the brains nor the skills of a lieutenant right now.

dialogs.525f0b67-3928-4689-b998-c31b42f2f549: And most of all, I know I'll need you to hold my hand through this whole thing. So I really can't act like I'm your boss.

dialogs.bb45bf6c-6463-4101-9137-5b7c750b2a24: Her tense expression gives way to one of utter surprise. But this makes me feel a million times more at ease.

dialogs.5e00fd6e-68fe-4c34-9823-528621a8fba1: Could you do that for me? In return for trusting you, I'd like you to talk to me in a way that firmly establishes that bond of trust between us.

dialogs.fdedb478-7b28-4aae-9f23-b89a1c0b25fd: I can't say this sits entirely right with me...

dialogs.5c6e3326-50fb-4308-b301-d7965e61e637: But very well, if you insist.  Only until you regain your memories, though.

dialogs.378c7461-dc91-4fd6-b4f8-c3544b004824: Ja...  Kou... Will that do, sir?
dialogs.85c2f852-b040-40b1-b642-9adf7c9a3f7a: Despite seeming somewhat uncomfortable with it, Rain utters my name.

dialogs.8726d19d-e8ca-4321-8864-8673c542c012: Not with all this crap on my mind.
dialogs.4259d7a6-7895-4f56-a124-3da88beb8243: Well, anyone could've seen it coming in this situation.
dialogs.dc136b5e-59a2-4f8b-8acb-cbde69b7c190: But as much as I hate to admit it, what's bothering me most right now is the woman lying next to me.
dialogs.98ff4955-bd9d-40e2-9eca-51b478dd8b26: I feel a soft, warm touch every time our bodies come into contact, and it's too much for me to take.

dialogs.b65e9ca7-1f0e-4113-b0df-cb98e325d2d8: I really should've just slept on the couch. I remember the argument we had before calling it a night.

dialogs.11eec505-f4d2-4525-b1bb-7053d2d47326: Why can't you just sleep on the bed? It's big enough for both of us.

dialogs.07b7e86e-3780-4477-baba-744d2dfae426: Lieute I mean, Kou. We're sure to be busy for a while now, so I can't have you catching a cold.
dialogs.5cd659fb-0e86-49b8-aed7-7655a40f9396: The moment I let her talk me into sleeping on the bed was the moment I ran out of luck.

dialogs.a76d1d5b-dfb9-4376-8d56-807f636c469a: Okay, so I won't catch a cold now. But I sure as hell am gonna be sleep deprived.

dialogs.d65325d6-4d12-4432-9b37-6fcbaa0d6138: Surprised, I turn around and see Rain staring at me.

dialogs.b7a53b80-bd86-46b0-b0db-853554011404: "You won't last very long if you keep getting bothered by a fellow soldier's gender. We sleep together a lot, if not as much as those in the army do."

dialogs.e889e82d-f187-4cb9-b8b3-77eaa161cb3a: Yeah, it certainly doesn't seem to be bothering her too much.

dialogs.00b13241-25d7-46e6-b2a1-63640944b118: "But I've never stayed in this kind of hotel before... Wait, it is my first time, right?"

dialogs.7a0c512f-98aa-4e12-8845-9300f425ffa7: Get a grip, you moron! You really, really shouldn't ask her if we've done it before.
dialogs.8f6e9aec-a567-40e6-960f-e2d2adcc7231: It's not unusual for soldiers to sleep with one another. Relationships in the military are all about snap decisions, with fortune favoring the bold.
dialogs.97332710-09db-419e-9f20-ed1cfd3f9cfb: For example, if you waste too much time planning to ask someone out on the weekend, one of you might be dead by then.
dialogs.366a3f7e-95c5-47e8-871e-596b43aa36e8: A love letter might end up becoming a farewell note. Given those circumstances, soldier romances tend to be very utilitarian in nature.
dialogs.75789fbc-e2fc-4a58-b626-0fa8047f6e0b: Why am I remembering all of this? It doesn't matter!

dialogs.7000601b-261a-4ebe-85ca-fb33780d5d30: I pull the blanket over my head and close my eyes. Bad idea, because the inside is filled with a nice, bittersweet scent.

dialogs.97aee5d8-c5dd-4376-8600-4b89f839d22e: The thought makes me jump, stick my head out, and take a deep breath.
dialogs.9aec3ee0-d7c3-4777-9788-5fe92a144603: Damn it, she's gonna laugh at me. I hope she didn't sleep in the same bed because she expected this to happen.

dialogs.813e63fe-00cc-4478-8783-16bcb348a73a: Oh, she didn't laugh. Or wait. Could she be stifling her laughter with all she's got?

dialogs.b18ff543-7ef3-4b4f-a054-79dffa2c6661: I can't deal with this. I feel like she's staring at me, but I'm not sure if it's just my imagination.

dialogs.2f37eb57-1868-48e3-b748-524d7d643835: I can't sleep like this! I make up my mind, turn toward Rain...

dialogs.91eb7eb4-e50e-4362-967b-f64774b2bc09: Apparently, I was the only one getting worked up.

dialogs.0e281ba6-e31b-418e-b159-f596efc6852a: "She really doesn't care that I'm a guy, huh?"
dialogs.c878d8a6-ee78-4759-8da3-e744499addae: As I struggle to cope with a complicated feeling that's part relief and part disappointment, my fatigue catches up to me.

dialogs.d198c877-7e90-4c11-8d23-de010ae07d42: Having lost my memories, I should be all alone in this world. I'm as powerless as a baby, and I have no idea what's going on.
dialogs.ae1573d6-5479-4286-adbb-9cfc21d943f1: But just having Rain by my side gives me strength.
dialogs.a2a2b041-c517-4524-af35-cfb4753f926e: The fact that she's a woman is a trifling matter in comparison.
dialogs.fe28d9e2-4818-4c3f-b23f-401544e28d3c: I decide to quit racking my brain.
dialogs.a89a7813-1bbb-415e-93ae-7b9ddad19d01: And my consciousness fades to black, enveloped in a sweet scent and a gentle warmth.

dialogs.f594e648-36ba-4683-94a2-7d10b8d20cdd: When I open my eyes to the sound of rain, the stained panels on the ceiling come into view.

dialogs.a5cb561b-78ae-4e96-a217-8c0adfac83aa: I look to my side and find Rain gone. Muddy daylight streams in through the windows.

dialogs.da8b5cab-cf72-4423-bea0-62d4349cb67b: It's not raining. Oh, is it the shower I've been hearing?
dialogs.5db41045-cfbb-4c0c-a438-4d577fa9c39c: I casually cast my eyes in the direction the noise is coming from.

dialogs.9ae97477-9795-44c3-87f0-021e88a2d162: Rain's inside the bathroom, and I can see everything inside through its glass door. That blows all my drowsiness away in an instant.
dialogs.3f501225-0181-4dd6-ae25-1e0bcbfe029f: Her long, slender legs and firm hips are simply gorgeous.

dialogs.8af6ef6e-2c98-4313-b44f-ce7858156515: Talk about a sight for sore eyes.
dialogs.fbfd20d1-174e-4f4c-ad6c-1dc017732f80: Somehow, I manage to look away and end up spotting the clothes she's taken off, along with the weapons lying on top of them.
dialogs.113948d9-0ce3-4670-a7ed-b7cf3a067c2c: Sheathed knives of various sizes, a pair of pistols, and even a set of throwing knives in her boots.
dialogs.1b4d8eed-b8f7-45df-8869-c89a1769747d: The contrast between her classy underwear and the weapons makes me sigh.

dialogs.cdf4d764-bbd1-400a-944a-33a77949169b: I have to remember that she is a soldier herself.
dialogs.bbda2efe-1dda-4930-9852-8e26a5b19d4a: Muttering to myself, I reach out for my own clothes and find a gun in there as well.

dialogs.46350e2e-1a4d-4c9c-9d45-243a0336f005: I'm too scared to touch it directly, so I wind up picking it up together with my clothes and feel its weight in my hands.

dialogs.a5b5ee7b-12b1-47e0-93af-6646cb6eee76: Guess I would obviously be packing one of these if I'm a soldier too.
dialogs.ad0d0c71-948a-4d72-98a5-ee15795acbb8: When you lose your memories, you also tend to lose your grasp on your own identity. It's because you no longer remember what defines you as a person.

dialogs.48a46943-edc2-476b-b63a-7239e1381a01: Right then, the bathroom door opens.

dialogs.21cae9e7-1997-4ec4-a82c-58c002ff0bfb: The scent of soap and shampoo wafts up to my nose, and I look away in a hurry.
dialogs.844b6220-d8bb-46a3-a0f3-0d2ad11f6205: But I'm too late, because the sight of her flushed skin has been etched into my eyes.

dialogs.359c00c3-ccbb-495b-a277-96dbeddd7287: Go ahead and take a shower while I prepare our breakfast.

dialogs.f8172f07-db7e-4396-b1be-93c2f6944895: Don't worry. I won't peep at you.
dialogs.57bae189-4b86-4f79-8ec0-9f04c2aff721: She says that with a smile.

dialogs.b1ea0cea-f72e-4564-8f9a-45c90094f591: I start feeling somewhat awkward, so I grab my towel and run into the bathroom.

dialogs.641d759c-17bc-494c-ba5c-e18b9245d4ca: By the time I leave the bath, there are a bunch of opened cans on the table.

dialogs.ad7d8b5a-0669-41f0-9312-48808fede270: We left the base in a rush, so this is all I can offer you. I'm sorry.

dialogs.afc78ced-6daa-46b1-b9c8-1e5ee616a4f4: Wanting a proper meal would be asking for too much. Besides...

dialogs.cbbc6cd2-5141-4d0c-acd0-bac3f9c90fcd: I was probably used to eating this stuff, right?

dialogs.5e3b8ff7-ed8b-4c77-9ad2-cf96babf27ad: Could I eat all the canned food here without being picky?

dialogs.01cc8a02-bc11-4d5a-9620-5e8102368daa: I see. You would know because you've spent a lot of time with me, right?

dialogs.879ab422-4d62-4308-9626-14f919e432b3: Uh, what made me join the military again?

dialogs.743ac200-4cfd-42e5-9e6b-fa7bc70ed94c: I think you would be better off recalling that yourself. Asking me should be your last resort.

dialogs.6b364cee-9dba-4df9-8f7e-d18f59513c2c: Having a heart-to-heart seems unlikely. We silently wolf down our food.
dialogs.88e547cc-8422-44e1-a641-c53fea0c990e: Rain has a somewhat cold smile on her face. I can't figure out what's hidden behind it just yet.
dialogs.225f113b-26cb-43b4-af75-39de07a14cdb: She certainly isn't mocking me or anything, but her smile is stiff and her attitude business-like. You could simply take that as the way she interacts with a superior officer, but...

dialogs.9d7a6db8-d3b4-43aa-bf1a-a95d48946ceb: Anyway, I ran a diagnostic scan while you were asleep.

dialogs.c17b9eef-ff7a-4d8c-ada5-626cddc856b4: Apparently, your brain chip has been damaged.

dialogs.ee5c268d-3a45-4345-8d6c-b1ef1f61a9a6: Thankfully, that doesn't seem to be affecting its basic functionality.

dialogs.047bd1a6-b0b5-4e39-9ca0-f525c5ad8d5d: Hearing the term makes me remember the concept. Brain chips are more than familiar to the people of this era.
dialogs.294beac7-98dc-4ee3-aff9-011e87902856: Connected to neurojacks on one end and our brains on the other, they act as a direct signal interface between human minds and computers to bring VR to life.

dialogs.1d4ebbf9-1639-4b64-aeb6-25a22cbf1d92: Hang on. Why are my memories gone, then? The chip's functioning normally despite the damage, right?

dialogs.8178b2f0-4cb7-43bd-8f60-32c5cc5dcc56: Maybe it's not the chip that's broken, but your brain instead?

dialogs.4fac375b-71b2-4dc9-9f06-58b965e2f13f: These are biochips we're talking about. They're more or less integrated with our brains.

dialogs.7962aadd-8586-4443-a301-f363575d0b2b: She says the scariest things so casually.

dialogs.05ab11da-cdeb-44ed-ad62-0cfc895dec18: But I cannot say for sure, because I'm not exactly an expert. This is all merely conjecture on my part.

dialogs.8391eba2-18b5-4d54-8b65-b0ff33d20a13: Please don't make me any more worried than I already am.

dialogs.814a3378-ca79-4a28-baf3-b4be1b241b59: But memories, huh?  Couldn't they return if I were given a shock of some sort?

dialogs.26da4fc9-112c-44d3-90b1-cdf6e648e365: That's not out of the question,@t0300@hRAIN_A202OD but what kind of shock?

dialogs.b939b9ca-f20f-4729-b5e7-e01519db94b2: Well, for example, I remembered how to pilot a simulacrum.  So maybe if I transform again...

dialogs.8f11321c-1f0c-4220-9348-4a289c26cc26: Shall we try it out, then?
dialogs.d3868a50-991c-4622-9149-1839459ff90a: Rain takes out a cord reel from her pocket and straightens it out to grab the neurojack.

dialogs.63021c65-f0be-4f5c-a3e4-bb52219bf5c1: Sure. I need some post-meal exercise, anyway.

dialogs.1bce9d0d-6693-4937-8a80-67ae35dfff0f: We finish our breakfasts, after which Rain nods, stands up, and gets behind me.

dialogs.0161da3e-d4e2-4215-87b7-44230a3db1c0: She traces the back of my neck with her fingertips.

dialogs.a46d41b6-bdb8-44a1-8c4f-38b2de32f4a9: The artificial neck muscles open up in response, exposing my neurojack port.

dialogs.a698769e-929b-45ea-bae9-e97d0f3798d9: Normally, we don't need a wired connection, but we'll use one this time just in case.

dialogs.3491fe15-1009-4c06-afba-e8c5c2d565c0: What do you mean, we don't need a wired connection?

dialogs.915bd248-7a8f-49f2-abaf-6c6f1c0cc52e: I let out a small yelp when I feel the neurojack getting plugged in.

dialogs.c6dc1d2e-127b-40c7-918e-772cea62a23f: Rain holds up her hair and plugs in her neurojack too. I find that gesture oddly seductive.

dialogs.e4e55034-0a0f-4fe6-b78e-618a683d2733: I close my eyes and focus on nothing but empty space. Immediately, the chakra to the internet opens up and...

dialogs.cb9fa725-4ccd-4b32-bf11-df92a28954a2: I could never forget this, similar to how one never forgets how to walk or ride a bike. And just like that, my mind takes off to cyberspace.

dialogs.8a3cc039-46c4-4f90-8194-1e5f655ed65d: There's a shining wireframe grid extending in every direction as far as the eye can see.
dialogs.08ae9312-fa0f-4bbb-bd16-849e068e8bf7: The grid's dotted with countless icons, and there are avatars flying about, glowing like fireflies.

dialogs.709b3fe3-d275-4a4a-8c15-b18acf05bf72: That's right. This is the ether, the relay portal. A transfer point that connects countless virtual worlds.

dialogs.2cba97bf-05f3-4068-9aa3-5344fc008f3a: I see you still remember this view.
dialogs.00fdef4b-b81e-4634-be30-631511ff41ac: Rain's drifting right by my side. Her blonde hair looks like it's glowing as it floats in the air.

dialogs.348156b4-ffed-4115-b711-b7d9a51b532c: Yeah, this feels very familiar, like I've come back home.

dialogs.bafca736-28ae-4b2c-b14e-43287b2a3ee6: Keep recalling details of this world, one step at a time. I'll guide you through the whole thing.

dialogs.f41da2dd-6f78-42a5-a844-0dd792a8d4fc: She gently holds my hand. Even online, her touch is soft.

dialogs.4241c992-625b-49ef-a415-3d3b8486908b: As soon as the word leaves her mouth, her hand begins to harden. I follow suit and let that familiar process take over me.
dialogs.f90e1dc6-53b9-428d-93f0-38f2af0954ff: My body gets recomposed from the ground up. The digital versions of my cells get rewritten to take a robotic form.

dialogs.2642abfa-af4b-4619-8d6e-93ad28796bc5: The next moment, we find ourselves floating in the internet sky, having finished shifting into simulacrums.

dialogs.4a36e563-4e20-432f-9746-878837b587c8: We reach a virtual training ground, feeling like we've covered a fair bit of distance distance that isn't actually real.

dialogs.c7a6540f-d966-4514-98f6-d1aab8079ee4: Great. More comfortable than in my real body, even.

dialogs.bae8163b-4800-48d6-9d2b-e8488ecc7082: This can't be only the second time I've ever shifted in my life. My simulacrum feels way too familiar for that.
dialogs.5034a026-b527-4945-87c6-e91ca2b6a713: I feel powerful, like I can do anything I want. Even the loss of my memories doesn't strike me as a big deal right now.

dialogs.1baa560f-9206-4b32-be2f-9f7c4ec71472: Would you like to spar for a bit?

dialogs.748eb7a7-01cf-4c66-92fc-9e420ac0bcd7: Let's save that for another time. For now, let's start with lesson one...
dialogs.8fbc0894-b73b-4f84-ad1d-e67f95e55929: A bunch of metal beetles appear in midair and drop to the ground. They're the same type as the viruses we fought yesterday.

dialogs.a8d0aee0-cab0-4ae6-9601-f28e15241201: I'm all for shock therapy, but I don't know about throwing me right into a dogfight with these things.

dialogs.6cc37937-7881-47e6-9c68-5f130bc47b9a: Don't worry. This is only a mock battle, so your life won't be in danger even if your unit is destroyed.

dialogs.c84d181b-e954-4ae3-9210-826a1f0b421f: However, you will be in for a world of pain if you get hit.

dialogs.606d3073-7537-4ed8-be67-d4a125a025f9: So you're telling me to take this seriously, huh?

dialogs.51319040-1144-4fe7-a561-7b8d924d96b6: How pushy. Not that I mind.

dialogs.14b356aa-fa4c-4c89-9129-97ef9bcc65c5: Yeah, let's get this show on the road.  Bring it on, Rain.

dialogs.3e932485-413b-4d61-a7fa-5b68cb2430bf: So we really need to go to an expert.
dialogs.a3cd5ea8-7cc5-4bed-a7a0-1f3f454513e4: With those words, Rain gives me a pat on the shoulder.

dialogs.c0ce57ff-6136-45c0-a535-c40a3eb5e6f9: Early that afternoon, we set out into town, heading toward the clinic Rain mentioned last night.

dialogs.577a480b-3004-4188-b8a1-7f10858eb256: Shouldn't we have changed out of our uniforms?

dialogs.6f03389a-31f5-4a00-a288-4aa1e388fac3: Among the crowd, I spot several people decked out in uniforms of various designs.
dialogs.c735d2b7-5d7e-4483-b4f7-e2528d720d31: Apart from those soldiers, I also see sex workers, hoodlums, bums, and junkies of all ages and genders.

dialogs.40c2c6db-1adc-4acf-ac9e-4b5fb73068ca: Talk about a stellar urban environment.

dialogs.688d493d-a38d-4b64-a3fb-d511a0144ef6: Well, this is supposedly the modern-day Sodom. If you listen to the anti-AI people, anyway.

dialogs.fcd80ac3-6a61-4319-9ed1-d2d4842c439a: Anti-AI people? Is everyone still up in arms over the AI thing?

dialogs.30bf9767-0b3b-496b-9e3a-dde612089e16: If anything, things have escalated since you were a student.
dialogs.fd54a053-8660-4f40-8f12-eb5683e3753d: Rain shoots a weary look up at the sky.
dialogs.db9b0046-7ce8-43c2-b040-32b2d9185931: In this day and age, the internet has become the lifeblood of civilization.
dialogs.dfaa7995-71af-40f3-ab1c-9cd8bca63de6: And it is governed by countless AI systems around the world, which construct and maintain our virtual reality.
dialogs.0f9fbb9d-573d-4457-b24c-6f8ea96c08b5: Unfortunately, there are more than a few people who hate the idea of mankind not holding the keys to its own society.

dialogs.ba4da0e9-572d-48b7-a91f-f27104db33c9: Suzushiro is at the very forefront of the conflict between the alienist and the anti-AI factions. That's exactly why soldiers like us come here in droves.

dialogs.7131891d-a32e-494a-9dd0-2654815856bc: Alienist? I don't know why, but just hearing that word puts me in a foul mood.

dialogs.0ed77bb5-062c-46b4-85f8-3554b0c53772: Likewise.  I sincerely doubt there are any second-gens out there who like that term.

dialogs.14e25aca-67cb-4f5c-a8c3-4d6efc18d5aa: It's what the anti-AI faction calls AI supporters. According to them, AIs are aliens, so anyone who backs them is an "alienist."
dialogs.5f631d02-aea9-406f-9992-b83b80030be8: I wonder if the battle I went through yesterday was also part of the conflict between the two factions.

dialogs.df42d82d-eb2b-46e7-b63b-149a9e347caa: In due time, you will come to realize that this city no, this whole era is by no means a peaceful one.

dialogs.c8187eaf-71dc-454a-96ee-4b77b509a07b: The sky above was the color of television from days gone by, tuned to a dead channel.
dialogs.5462d286-b081-4d72-ae23-af22527cbf64: Looking at the gloomy gray clouds makes me want to see a clear blue sky. I'm sure that'd make us all feel a little better.

dialogs.4760e5db-85ab-4570-8c9f-5eeaa234943c: We start walking down the city streets once again.

dialogs.165d922a-3fa4-455d-b564-0e4692775b3b: We take a bunch of twists and turns and end up in a filthy back alley.
dialogs.7e0561ff-c2ef-454e-9bd1-dc914444b957: Everywhere we go, the walls are covered in graffiti, and there's a sour stench emanating from the deserted street corners.

dialogs.e34646b5-8615-4536-bcbe-f4ed4440d473: Rain... We are going to a clinic, right?

dialogs.303e989b-92b4-4f4b-bae1-201c723972f5: Of course. But we currently cannot enlist the services of a formal medical facility.

dialogs.bfbd426d-27a8-420e-ac71-f52f56bae1b4: But that doesn't mean we have to turn to some unlicensed doctor in the slums, does it?

dialogs.9b7d9a32-1fc7-45ae-b851-f5b8c2f148dc: While she may be unlicensed, her skills are supposedly beyond compare. And she treats you without leaving any records on the internet, to boot.

dialogs.ec31f76d-9b16-457e-af54-0c56a0241d1c: Being reassured of her skills does nothing to ease my concerns about letting some fishy doc mess with my head.

dialogs.9cc5b444-49cd-4cd6-8772-4183a578181d: Rest assured. She can only hole up in these slums because her skills have a stellar reputation.

dialogs.89351ebb-9b72-4a7a-89e9-14c2ca3b815f: I honestly just wish she'd picked a better place to hole out in.  Who's this doctor, anyway?

dialogs.df93df82-b142-4946-aa32-8ce603372421: She goes by Dr. Noi. I've never met her either. I hear she charges a pretty penny but is willing to perform any kind of surgery.

dialogs.8549503c-44b1-44ec-83bf-cc64cf78b3b4: Even illegal cybernetic augmentation and cloning procedures?

dialogs.73c1bf99-7bdf-49c4-883d-d60becbff213: It's all about how much you're willing to spend, or so rumors say.

dialogs.684bde69-b61b-4a6f-baa2-847ed0b38494: She gets up to some crazy stuff, but it seems there's no doubting her skills.  Why would someone like her stay in these slums?

dialogs.b8b94c0d-921c-445d-aea0-319304122144: Suzushiro is a mecca of black medicine. Its lax regulations have attracted cutting-edge corporations from all over the world.

dialogs.7d95cc04-ee58-4388-9940-3031ef00dc20: And at the same time, the shady sort too?

dialogs.b39463aa-b6ef-41c2-b53b-c382fea5d5df: One can get everything they want in this city.  Anything goes here, be it bio, nano, AI, or even cloning technology...

dialogs.4a0fd081-b7d9-4ff5-91e1-0e2dace85ea7: Rain suddenly comes to a halt and starts looking around.

dialogs.03cff268-465c-488d-8721-64b4eca407fe: Well, going by the navigation, the clinic should be around here.
dialogs.58386d29-b4f1-4051-bcae-2584e16e287b: Puzzled, she surveys the street and then...

dialogs.1ead9148-6da0-446a-8156-9de6e3906661: A somewhat baffled tone. I follow her gaze and find an obnoxiously decorated show window.
dialogs.4ccf8c50-77e6-4b4d-ba52-38b2752ec0b6: Displayed in it are an array of enamel bustiers, bondage goods with chains, dildos, and leather whips.

dialogs.7563a515-a86f-4cba-a9f9-f8a177220384: Uh, it's clearly an adult goods store.

dialogs.e493020f-7006-4165-8ca3-d0a1d51adb55: Yes, but this should be the place.

dialogs.1edec7a3-37fa-493e-8ff2-9f03c7436cf7: Upon hearing a lispy voice, I turn around to find a young girl, dressed in black, staring warily at us.
dialogs.2e09e26f-5eb6-4187-b32c-3da32b5f045c: Her frilly dress is so out of place on these filthy streets, it's kinda hard to look at.

dialogs.43c012f4-488a-4267-998c-934e2e8ef9de: It's bad form to answer one question with another. Who are you people? Which mercenary group do you belong to?
dialogs.545e1948-ca64-4c78-af1b-58a3eaf30a5f: The way she talks doesn't suit her age at all.
dialogs.051668c7-7bbe-4735-815f-410a9b888cbe: She has a cute little face, but the look in her eyes is the furthest thing from childlike.
dialogs.6494e2e5-3d91-4e89-be61-490ddcc7e313: She might be going through some tough times. I start feeling sorry for her when I think about her life in the slums.

dialogs.b9176d27-4242-4c3a-bfbd-0988408369fb: Hey, do you mind if we ask you something?

dialogs.b61bf42e-fa43-41f8-aeb6-d10c98059e09: I take out some change and offer it to her...

dialogs.a19e6864-d78e-417f-9c7d-3f744cd7e673: What the heck? What do you want me to do with that paltry amount?
dialogs.bddc2835-0bb4-4e53-b691-a8c5c90df71f: But she ignores it and glares at me.

dialogs.3240a1c4-3a06-4ce7-b335-e7a015a2c5e8: Sorry, was that not enough? I don't mind giving you more...  but only if you talk to me.

dialogs.a4d1c604-8f12-4f28-bf00-08c3c4dd0b29: Uh, we're looking for Dr. Noi. Do you know anything?

dialogs.e44c90a8-d5e9-48aa-b9b2-ec2b1223bd19: I'm Noi. My ID is F12A699B. Look it up in the public database.

dialogs.7b71f31e-1770-4c47-b50b-416a800766ba: As my thought process grinds to a halt, a whole bunch of text starts scrolling in front of my eyes.

dialogs.52774a61-b3b9-459f-8c44-72e20d11f70c: Looks like Rain sent me Dr. Noi's data. I scan through the text and...

dialogs.d10046a7-53dd-4a4c-99df-2ca459c651a3: Did you have to reprise the exact same routine everyone does when they meet me for the first time? Frankly, I'm sick of it.
dialogs.abe4c9bb-54d5-4ed3-b317-26eb3bf91243: The absurdity of it all leaves me scratching my head. I mean, okay, maybe I was in the wrong here...

dialogs.89d98d34-106e-4fef-ab0f-ac5af52a8f4c: Pardon us, Dr. Noi. The thing is, we need your help.
dialogs.2992ad30-9c4d-4a75-9b1c-d24cb6a966d2: Rain barges into the conversation right on time.

dialogs.e45662e7-6542-4e31-b9b5-ab4eaf0ee4be: I'm sorry to say this, but I don't accept first-time patients without a referral.  Also, I hate people who judge books by their cover.

dialogs.8911542c-97a7-4309-b924-6b1793d1e11b: Uh, I didn't mean to offend you...

dialogs.583cf8fc-feb2-48c7-8fb5-0fbb3991d70a: Most importantly, can you even afford me? I'll have you know my consultation fees are quite high.

dialogs.cb4649fc-b93f-4eb7-9b21-ff101c14ae51: Could you look up the lieute... Kou Kadokura's name in the Mercenary Guild's database?

dialogs.65cb5853-5b63-457c-b5d4-62f56ecfa60f: After shooting Rain a glance, Noi's eyes start darting around the place.

dialogs.754f32a7-9f13-4f65-aca3-930925bfdef1: It's like she's reading something in midair, probably data pertaining to me.

dialogs.9f4024e9-ff5c-41e9-9259-2c208d6a7799: All right. I guess I won't have to worry about you not paying up.

dialogs.aa9ac93c-95e2-4bbc-b239-f90e42e27bc8: How amusing. I like you. Come on in.
dialogs.e7afa287-bb88-480f-9518-7b4cdf580837: Noi gives me a slap on my back and walks into her distasteful shop.

dialogs.c8f4089d-dc86-4562-a860-72f5e6382d9a: I wonder what exactly she found amusing.

dialogs.20f8d614-1c86-4735-9c9c-5532934363da: Hey, Rain. It seems unlikely to me, but is there anything funny written on my profile?

dialogs.8636706b-dee8-42a3-b776-7aaf8cdfe148: Can we do this later? We're keeping the doctor waiting.
dialogs.57846806-0ac7-43af-928c-e6a397ea74b8: Rain grabs my arm and drags me inside.

dialogs.823314c4-d91b-4440-8320-a0772d69f0ca: These are rather eccentric interiors for a clinic.

dialogs.676a63d2-4cfc-4d71-992f-8221e20d2eb1: Let's just say they align with my tastes, and also my interests camouflage, to be more specific.

dialogs.225d1e52-bc85-40d0-8d02-e2b8eeea611d: In the back of what seemed to be an antique adult goods store is a modern clinic.

dialogs.17be252e-bacb-4102-b7a9-107861d5d473: So what do you need? Seeing as you've brought your girlfriend along, is it sex-related?

dialogs.fb719041-c8b8-4859-99f8-d3c4ff1396ad: Augments, then? You're in luck. I happen to have a great bio part in stock right now.
dialogs.7693bdad-81f1-45fa-a9aa-36c8807c5dfb: With a twisted smile, she points at a water tank installed at the back of the room. Wriggling about in it is a soft, phallic creature.

dialogs.acbc63b2-2088-41ca-ae67-09a8d289286a: Ew. Are people really implanting that crap?

dialogs.b05f8728-4a1c-44ec-a642-cdcb9d5d0f19: They are. That thing can leave even the coolest women begging for mercy.
dialogs.a6acb604-c7e1-4391-a9d7-44393d384521: Noi gives me a suggestive smile, and I end up looking in Rain's direction.

dialogs.87d63b3f-7b21-427c-949e-29dd4a7197f8: Could you please take this seriously?

dialogs.37aa7a5e-a1b5-4148-a673-569b9a350196: I know, I know. I just wanted to mess with him a little. So, what do you really need?

dialogs.95ab5127-10e4-4640-8227-c88837b4f347: His brain chip repaired. You will do it, yes?

dialogs.6e9fec90-0cf0-43c9-8e39-757cb4eeacc7: His brain's fried?  Why not go to an actual hospital, then? You do realize that insurance won't cover the costs here, right?

dialogs.5bd229e9-b143-43ca-928c-eff2211a0b7b: Hmm... You seem to have your reasons.

dialogs.bf9288e4-9de7-44bb-a229-5378813fbd83: Very well, I'll leave my questions for later. Sit down over there. Let me take a look.
dialogs.caf1d6cb-b29d-499a-876f-3ce24b13d00b: Noi makes me sit in a medical console and plugs in a neurojack.

dialogs.8fc0f21f-556a-4b51-8911-953f8442b116: After examining me for a while, she finally opens her mouth.

dialogs.43bd5025-ae70-48ef-aaf5-8426f97f52aa: This is amazing. The chip's safety mechanism saved his skin.

dialogs.160ecdc7-5ab0-4b19-9911-83dce9e0b979: I don't know exactly how it happened, whether it was a logic bomb or black ICE or what...

dialogs.c433f768-d06a-4634-b932-e8cd707c5e75: But I assume something overloaded him online and knocked him out, and his chip took the damage in place of his brain cells. Am I right?

dialogs.4a04f1e6-980b-4fca-a080-b5e2965afcad: Yes, it was a logic bomb. It wiped out our entire squad, save for him and me.
dialogs.00371941-e1cf-4a92-aded-09ef2926dee6: She actually figured out the cause with just a cursory look? I guess her skills are the real deal.
dialogs.7e2166bb-29bc-446c-ab37-0ed1f75437b8: As I sit there impressed, Noi starts smacking me on the back again.

dialogs.2e0e4018-ceb5-43de-a3dd-dd5f803a6520: You're a lucky, lucky boy. If your chip had different features, you would've been flatlined for sure.

dialogs.c3ba9016-cece-41b3-9816-9ba93c48f233: Is my brain that badly damaged?

dialogs.4df87582-8d1c-4a69-9b7d-e50fcc23016a: Yeah, your brain chip has been partially destroyed. But thanks to that, your cells escaped harm.

dialogs.05741758-9316-4cfe-bac2-6d59bc24d27d: She projects some images on the wall monitor. Sadly, I have no idea what any of it means.

dialogs.85d00126-eca9-4aea-9085-01a7286c6e19: Your chip comes with a safety mechanism. It took the damage your brain would've suffered and saved your life.

dialogs.ef1291cc-b79e-4541-a603-8f1470815025: And that destroyed the chip, causing his amnesia?
dialogs.54509020-89c8-4a58-9a09-3c42425f2ad8: Hearing all this sends chills down my spine.
dialogs.8b762386-aaa3-41e0-bc2e-b54f5209bba9: Brain chips are more or less integrated with the brain. If mine was destroyed, I doubt my brain escaped completely unscathed.

dialogs.132f2e08-e1c4-4181-9d16-19946fa724b0: Are my memories gone forever, then?

dialogs.2fa05d28-474e-488e-8a1d-808cb0eadb5d: Not necessarily. How should I explain this?
dialogs.d87d8972-fc3b-4902-9f5a-a1b0d4c0748f: Noi folds her arms and tries to carefully choose her words for me.

dialogs.cf639a85-e103-4b8f-a133-82dc1647f4e5: Right now, your brain is like a big dictionary that's missing its index.

dialogs.a0eb0cbe-2638-4bc1-aaa1-92e846d49b93: Its contents are fine, but you're unable to find the pages you need. Does that make sense?

dialogs.f0ae0076-1773-41d1-810d-4d7f7536ee19: Kinda like broken links on the internet of old?

dialogs.e1c361b0-d0dd-4d53-babe-23781664e7dc: The information would be somewhere out there, but the links would lead to 404s.

dialogs.94af1cb1-74a6-4348-80d2-4ea3d76234bf: You mean his memories are still intact, even though they can't be accessed?

dialogs.9e98ca41-0b63-4e8e-80e6-f0d4296d03a5: That's a bit of a relief. Now, the question is how to access those memories.

dialogs.aa541cbf-cac1-480e-810e-690ed85b0ac5: You should thank your lucky stars for the technological advancements we've made. In the past, repairing brain chip damage required surgery and long-term rehab.

dialogs.b7f1a2c7-fc48-4410-8bcc-d352720d428c: But now, these will do the trick in a jiffy.

dialogs.26ea39dd-56b2-4ae5-84f4-ca979622e2fb: Saying that, she picks up a jet syringe and loads it with some suspicious capsule.

dialogs.f013bc90-4363-4585-84c3-ce6a41915c68: Medical nanomachines. This microscopic army of machines will repair your chip and brain cells, and initiate memory playback.

dialogs.408b95d2-4e03-4dc0-8337-0654bd47a404: It's bleeding-edge tech I had delivered from Chiba City the other day.  I've been wanting to test these babies out on someone.

dialogs.84fa260d-b3bc-440b-ae1e-f2082fc7c6d8: H-Hold up! What do you mean, test them out?

dialogs.eb4adfc0-d36a-4a03-b6ea-923261f758fd: Relax. Sure, they haven't received official clearance yet, but they've successfully completed all the human experi I mean, clinical tests.

dialogs.c0e73486-742e-4997-a0fc-9d13c543fd55: Whoa! You've got to be kidding me!
dialogs.e4d41883-ee91-45ed-84fb-b2889f3e09ee: Before I can voice my objections, the syringe is stuck in my neck, and I hear it emptying its contents into me.

dialogs.8e29620d-296a-4e97-8416-8fe026cc40ec: That makes me sink into the console.

dialogs.6e4fbaea-de69-4b95-aca7-d34171a8a659: Administering complete. It should start showing its effects soon.

dialogs.a5bf0283-4f45-4c54-bbb6-27bebeaf6c60: Do you feel anything out of the ordinary?

dialogs.241c0dfe-ebbc-4a12-9886-97c99033fbb8: Not really.  Hang on, my head feels a bit warm...

dialogs.0747a044-014b-4823-9fcd-0a0d37887bbf: My head burns up the very next moment and my eyes lose focus, almost like I'm drunk out of my wits.
dialogs.368395f6-5ee6-4c85-870e-d09f6333d67f: Countless nanomachines must be running around in my brain right now. Just thinking about it makes me sick.

dialogs.92fe4e26-436d-4947-8d5a-28eb42fd610e: Until the mid-19th century, a good doctor was defined by how quickly he could cut off a patient's legs. Anesthesia hadn't been invented yet, you see.
dialogs.f0dc91c2-e1df-4249-ab7a-499b6c37a05b: Noi's voice feels strangely distant. Something akin to sleepiness takes over my mind.

dialogs.692ff162-87d7-4a7c-ae2d-e81124584294: Later, with the advent of anesthesia, it became possible to safely cut open the affected parts.

dialogs.4bf55d85-0f6f-46bc-8a78-02703da4bedc: And now, nanomachines have made it possible to selectively repair or destroy brain cells without any incision at all.

dialogs.5d633d3a-5de9-4f64-a0a3-1b7af2cb3bb0: I'm glad I don't need surgery, but this still gives me the creeps.

dialogs.ddeac9c8-b25b-4fb0-aa26-2993bdb56ad2: Rain holds my hand tight. Her touch makes me let out a sigh...

dialogs.e81afd16-94c5-43c9-a52a-d5c773a65910: Relax. Calm your mind like you do when you dive.
dialogs.dcbef12d-74ca-4564-aa2e-317debe47c43: Even as I listen to her, my consciousness begins to fade away. Those tiny insects are messing with my brain cells.

dialogs.54031d04-75c5-43fb-96cf-f6639fd3637b: You will now experience your own memories once again, like you're watching a 5D sense hologram.

dialogs.28c2ab65-45d1-459e-bad3-73ad49aeb0ae: Now, close your eyes. Let the little ones guide you as you dive into your memories.
dialogs.7349d9bc-72e6-434c-aec0-2a6c55f5de2b: I do as I'm told and close my eyes, but I can still feel something bright closing in on me.

dialogs.7417e13a-b21a-4600-83f1-76f7d665d838: And so, my world is engulfed in light.

dialogs.d087fdf6-d1f8-419f-b32c-4717750da321: As my eyes get used to the light, a dreary ceiling and a girl wearing a lab coat over a dress come into view.

dialogs.49e19073-f129-4b59-8803-5c4a93245068: You seemed to be having a nice dream.

dialogs.b337579c-6d9e-405f-bac5-411e0e584d1a: So all that stuff was my own memories. I was having a flashback, huh?
dialogs.6c40c3cd-7fa9-47a2-aeef-bba263e50a17: Who won that first battle between Masa and me? I try to remember, but I can't.
dialogs.1ff06e5a-312f-4937-95e5-d0bfa7b69aae: A pang of sadness takes hold of my heart. I can't believe years have passed since that sunny day.

dialogs.5c3994de-a90a-4e04-89c1-b4d613ed6612: My school days.  It was around the start of spring break in my first year.

dialogs.a164a9e8-cec6-4a5c-8b99-5f5f4a9f5654: Not that long ago, then. In cases like yours, the most recent memories are usually the likeliest to go, but it seems you've only lost a few years' worth.

dialogs.fdb85667-7fd9-4207-b3dc-511f964ce42f: The significance of a few years tends to differ depending on whether one is in their teens, twenties, or thirties. It probably wasn't as long ago as it feels to you.

dialogs.22dc7c7e-1205-4985-8570-9485c5bea4e3: What has happened to the world since then? Are Masa and Aki still doing okay?

dialogs.408d84bb-8f5b-4336-8a88-563f57a76efa: You'll experience frequent flashbacks over the next few days. Anyway, you should get some rest for now. Brain cells are very delicate biomachines.

dialogs.2793b3cc-1c31-4462-be67-8af52aed6c95: Oh, Rain.  I feel really tired for some reason, even though all I did was take a nap.

dialogs.383b25bd-5933-49ac-818d-91ccbcb04fe9: Go back to sleep. Noi said we could stay the night here.
dialogs.e5e5f57c-e6e6-475a-b7d0-043f434905e1: She gives me her usual, somewhat businesslike smile. But it has a tinge of weariness right now.

dialogs.15e75a17-12d8-47eb-9e47-a0c6e613a7fd: Have you been here the entire time?

dialogs.03371396-4424-413e-b570-910e96b95cb0: Yes. I had nothing else in particular to do.
dialogs.6b7ce3ad-671c-4e9f-9f68-0c2f37189e1c: A blunt reply, but she then covers me up to my shoulders in a blanket.

dialogs.4f13dbed-4d21-41f2-bfe9-cce25549aca6: No problem. However, please don't forget that we aren't in a position to relax.

dialogs.807b1f7d-011d-4d23-b445-cc4d7ecb0a9d: I know. This is no time to be basking in reminiscence.

dialogs.e2943444-9af7-4697-9cd7-c7daedec80c8: Yeah, I know that in my head...
dialogs.cf0b9f6d-c5a5-437b-9809-1949e4e69d3b: The events I only experienced a few minutes ago are several years old in reality.
dialogs.a813eb9d-74db-4999-a4c2-9cac894d58af: I can't go back to those times anymore. I understand in my head that a lot of time has passed, but my heart refuses to come to terms with it.
dialogs.4ffc369e-3035-4ecf-9624-9912318e67b2: I wanna go back to Kisaragi Dorm.
dialogs.6f050f5b-466e-472b-a90f-176a96c53c62: Even as that thought fills my head, my eyelids grow steadily heavier.

dialogs.f4adf2b3-9cea-4f58-ac16-4cf6470d3e9a: And my mind dives into the dreamworld, this time for real.
